sentences: Nad valisid endi keskelt kolm saadikut.
Meie keskelt on ootamatu surma läbi lahkunud.
.. ta leidis kergesti sõpru nii omataoliste boheemlaste kui ka rahakate tõusikute keskelt.
context: The word 'valisid' is the past tense plural form of the Estonian verb 'valida', which means 'to choose' or 'to select'. In the provided examples, it shows a group selecting representatives from their own midst. The word appears in contexts where choices are being made from among people within a particular group or community.
